docs.text: 👋 Hi, I'm Engr. Abdul Wahab ¶ Mechanical Design Engineer and Product Designer with 1.5+ years of hands-on experience specializing in SolidWorks-based CAD modeling , complex assemblies, and manufacturing drawings. I transform concepts into production-ready designs with a strong focus on accuracy, manufacturability, and functional performance. 🎯 What I Do 🎯 What I Do ¶ Product & Industrial Design 3D Modeling and Assemblies Manufacturing Drawings Design Optimization Solve the problems Client-focused Engineering Solutions

docs.title: 🎯 What I Do

docs.text: 📐 Mechanical Design & Product Design Engineer ¶ Many businesses and startups struggle to transform ideas into precise, manufacturable designs. Poorly detailed CAD models, inaccurate drawings, and impractical designs often lead to production delays, increased costs, and design failures. Without a skilled mechanical design engineer, even a strong concept can fail during manufacturing. Inaccurate tolerances, weak assemblies, or incomplete technical documentation can compromise product quality and functionality. I am Engr. Abdul Wahab , a Mechanical Design Engineer and Product Designer with over 1.5 years of hands-on experience . I deliver highly accurate 3D parts, assemblies, and detailed engineering drawings tailored for real-world manufacturing. 📐 Mechanical Design & Product Design Engineer 🏆 Completed Projects 🧰 Industrial Projects 🛍️ Consumer Products 🏭 Industrial & Consumer Products 🎯 My Expertise ✅ Ready to Help 🏆 Completed Projects ¶ I have successfully completed numerous mini and industrial projects, including: 🧰 Industrial Projects ¶ Centrifugal Pump Heat Exchanger Parabolic Trough 🛍️ Consumer Products ¶ Disposable Bottle Cap Daster-Khiwan Dustbin Redmi Note 10 Pro Phone Casing Unique Table & Mobius Ring 🏭 Industrial & Consumer Products ¶ Mixture Machine CLI Toothbrush NEMO Helmet Water Tap 🎯 My Expertise ¶ My expertise lies in combining engineering precision, creativity, and manufacturability. I focus on delivering functional, innovative, and production-ready designs that meet technical standards and client expectations. ✅ Ready to Help ¶ If you are looking for reliable, precise, and professional mechanical design support, I am ready to help turn your ideas into reality.

Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. pabout me ¶ About Me ¶ I am a Mechanical Design Engineer and Product Designer based in Pakistan with over 1.5 years of professional experience . I have designed industrial machinery, mechanical systems, and consumer products , ensuring compliance with engineering standards and real-world manufacturability. 🎓 Education ¶ Bachelor of Science – Mechanical Engineering University of Engineering and Technology (UET), Peshawar 2019 – 2023 CGPA: 2.97 / 4.00 📊 Experience ¶ Mechanical Design Engineer (Self-Employed) ¶ Islamabad, Pakistan | Dec 2024 – Present Designed precise 3D parts, assemblies, and production drawings using SolidWorks Completed industrial and mini projects including: Centrifugal Pumps Heat Exchangers Phone Casings Parabolic Troughs Developed consumer products such as: Mixture Machines Toothbrushes Water Taps Waste Bins Helmets Ensured manufacturability, dimensional accuracy, and performance Worked directly with clients to deliver cost-effective design solutions US Tax Preparer & Business Consultant (Part-Time) ¶ Be-Filing | Islamabad | Dec 2024 – Present Prepared US individual & small business tax returns Assisted with ITIN applications (Form W-7) Supported non-resident & international clients Ensured full IRS compliance

docs.text: Project 1 | Universal Flush-Driven Aerosol Air Freshener Mechanism Project 2 | Mixture Machine Project 3 | CLI Tooth Brush Project 4 | Mini Projects Project 1 | Universal Flush-Driven Aerosol Air Freshener Mechanism ¶ Description: Click here for more details Project 2 | Mixture Machine ¶ Consumers often face bulky mixers that are hard to clean and use too much energy. I designed the MXR Smart Mixer to solve this with a compact, energy-efficient design, detachable dishwasher-safe parts, and precise speed control, making mixing easier and cleanup faster. Click here for more details Project 3 | CLI Tooth Brush ¶ Consumers often use traditional toothbrushes that create waste and don’t stay hygienic. I designed the CLI Toothbrush with a sustainable design and UV technology that eliminates 99.88% of bacteria. With a travel-friendly case, it keeps hygiene high and reduces waste, making oral care cleaner and smarter. Click here for more details Project 4 | Mini Projects ¶ Successfully designed and completed various industrial and mini projects, including centrifugal pumps, heat exchangers, phone casings, and parabolic troughs. Additionally, developed consumer products like mixer machines, toothbrushes, water taps, waste bins, and helmets. Click here formore details.
